Reviews.Title: Great beginners phone.
Reviews.Author: Carlos R Diaz
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone for my mother who is not into smartphones. This is a great basic phone. Very easy to use and the voice quality  it amazing. SInce it is unlocked I tried it on both AT&T; and TMobile, and it works great. if you want a basic phone to place and receive calls seek no further.Yo ordené este teléfono para mi madre que no anda en eso de los teléfonos inteligentes. Este es un teléfono básico muy bueno. Muy fácil de usar y la calidad de voz es asombrosa. Puesto que es un teléfono desbloqueado, lo probé con AT&T; y TMobile y funciona muy bien. Si quieres un teléfono sencillo para hacer y recibir llamadas, no busques más.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone!!! (Even for Today) "Edited"
Reviews.Author: DB62
Reviews.Content: Excluding the i-phone, there are 2 name brands I consider better than the rest.In my opinion, both Samsung and Motorola make the best quality cell phones.Now for the Samsung C414M, this is a very well built phone, yet still sleek but not to small.I prefer a flip phone, or clam shell type (whichever you like to call them).I have no need for a smart phone, as I only use this phone, as a phone.The camera and other features are simply a bonus, that I'll never use.This C414M has very good battery life, the display is very clear and easy to read.The menu is intuitive and easy to navigate.The sound quality is very good to excellent, and the ringing sound is plenty loud.This is a 3G phone, so again, the sound quality is just great in my opinion!Even with only one or two antenna signal bars showing, my calls are fast, and clear as a bell.This phone does not come with a MicroSD memory card.You can add one for a small cost. I've ordered a SanDisk Ultra MicroSD.I've been using SanDisk memory cards of all kinds, for many years, with "0" failures.SanDisk makes some of the fastest memory cards in the market today.The only thing I would have liked included, would be a car charger, but no biggy there.This phone comes completely unlocked, to use with most any GSM network (AT&T;, T-Mobile, ect...).Just pop in your own SIM card and your off.Edit:This phone is very cement unfriendly!!! lolThe surface of this phone is fairly slippery, so add that to it's slender size, and it's easy to drop! Mine has kissed concrete 5 times, the 5th time, it just stopped working. So now I'm using a Rugby 2, and love it.In the end, this is a top notch phone, easy to program/setup, easy to use, and looks very sharp. High quality!It does have web browsing, picture & video, email, and texting capabilities.At the price Amazon's selling these for, it's by far, more than a good deal!In fact, I'm going to buy a second one as a spare.All I'd need to do to use it, is swap my SIM card.I highly recommend this phone to anyone looking for a simple & easy to use phone.

Reviews.Title: very good basic phone w/ a few more bells than I expected
Reviews.Author: Mark D. Gordon
Reviews.Content: This is a very good basic phone w/ a few more bells than I expected.  Camera & MP3 player are serviceable.  Built-in software can render text and word documents.  "Operating System" is easy to use even w/o looking at the downloaded pdf manual.  Had no trouble moving files from the phone to the microsd card.My biggest complaint is the lack of a 3.5mm headphone jack.  The supplied headphones use the micro usb port.  Samsung Canada does not have any information on accessories for this phone.  I'm still looking for a micro usb to 3.5mm adapter that is made for this phone.  Will probably take a chance at one of the ones I've seen on Amazon that are not specifically for this phone.I guess that makes my 2nd biggest complaint being the manual doesn't list or make mention of accessories particularly to utilize the micro usb but even to recommend they type of microsd card to use9/7/13 - quick update. I did find that "B004T6N67K - New Samsung Micro USB To 3.5mm Headset Adapter With BONUS 3.5mm Stereo Headset Popular High Quality" worked as a micros usb to 3.5mm Adapter.

Reviews.Title: Good simple phone that works
Reviews.Author: No time for a rocking chair in retirement
Reviews.Content: I bought this one to replace an older flip phone. We travel internationally so it is good to have one I can use with an inexpensive SIMM in a foreign country and have local phone access there. It has a screen you can see when it's folded so you know who's calling without opening it up. The sound is good. It takes decent pictures. I had to call Samsung tech support to figure out how to get the pictures to save to the mini SD chip I put in it. They were immediately available and helped me solve the problem. If you want a simple phone, this is a good choice. I don't use the internet on my phone so I can't say how it works that way. I use it with a prepaid $30/month unlimited talk & text plan from H2Owireless (www.h2owirelessnow) and it works great for not much money.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Sudarshan Ravichandran
Reviews.Content: I love it. Its very nice and handy phone with the basic required features. I would definitely recommend this phone to every one.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Flip Phone
Reviews.Author: YORDANKA T.
Reviews.Content: The best phone for the price,Has everything you can expect from regular flip phone.Start working right away with my provider - T-mobile. My previous experience- to stay on phone with customer service for 5-6 hours till they agree that have to give me settings for certain phone even I didn't buy from them.Works perfect, good battery life.Thank you

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone
Reviews.Author: Kenville Lockhart
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone,Prefect for a person who wants a simple phone that works great.  Simple enough for anyone to use, while being just right for back up phone if a more expensive one is damaged.

Reviews.Title: good flip phone
Reviews.Author: Amazoner "VK"
Reviews.Content: My goal was to buy a GSM flip phone to use it in international trips. Samsung SGH-C414M satisfies my requirements. Most important is that it is new, with excellent battery. Provided user guide is short, but you can use info on Samsung web site, and it has a usual phone interface. Sound quality is good. It works well with Telna international SIM card. It is slim and fits well into a pocket.

Reviews.Title: Great for senior citizens.
Reviews.Author: Boo "Confused"
Reviews.Content: Got it for my husband. Unlocked. Keys are big and illuminated. Good sound quality. Quad band so I'm planning to use it for our next international trip. My husband does not text or play on his phone. He just wanted a phone to use as a phone. Perfect for his needs.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Flip Top Phone
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: Real Happy with this.  No dropped calls.  Sound is clear.  Very durable.  I have dropped it and think I may have broke it, but still all in one piece.  Fits nice in my  pocket or purse.Very Happy with this little phone.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Moi
Reviews.Content: The simple phone works like a charm. I am very pleased with it and will recommend it to anyone who wants just a "plain Jane" phone without all the bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: basic phone.
Reviews.Author: kim hedberg
Reviews.Content: Its an ok phone for the basics. Its too hard to txt with and takes poor pictures. Would buy a different phone next time.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for old generation.
Reviews.Author: Yong C.
Reviews.Content: Since my Dad only use it for calling and answering. This is great phone to him. Perfectly work with T-mobile in USA (I am in NY~) It only came with charger, manual, and phone.

Reviews.Title: UNLOCKED Samsung SGH-C414 C414M Quad Band Flip Cell phone
Reviews.Author: Larry T Miniard
Reviews.Content: Work better than expected.  I'm using an AT&T; sim but I have an Australian Zodafone sim which the phone recognized and I could access my stored contacts on it.

Reviews.Title: Good basic phone
Reviews.Author: Thomas Syrianoudis
Reviews.Content: Great phone with the features I want and not the ones I never use. Compact and very easy to use

Reviews.Title: Am happy with it
Reviews.Author: Abuela
Reviews.Content: This phone arrived in good condition and works just fine. I traded our wireless phone company telephone for this one. The sim card went in without a problem and telephone works as it should. It is user friendly and the keys are just a little bit larger; just the way I like them without making it look like a phone for kids or one for the visually impaired. I do not like the newer touch screen phones and need a phone that will stand up to my use. The phone folds and the exterior is kind of tough which is very important to me. The photos it takes are of decent quality suitable for my use of the camera. Though it is user friendly it could be a little easier to use which is why I gave it four instead of five stars. If you are looking for a phone with a camera, decent sized buttons, internet and is text user friendly this one is for you. If you are looking for one that is fancy with a high pixel camera than this is not it.

Reviews.Title: Adventure discovered & rediscovered
Reviews.Author: Steve Plaunt
Reviews.Content: Samsung didn't acknowledge the existance of this model, so I have had to discover most of it's functions by trial-an-error.

Reviews.Title: Battery Problems
Reviews.Author: monica batter
Reviews.Content: After charging the cell phone, the battery lasted only 6 hours without being used. I do not recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: The phone is just what I wanted.  Being a senior citizen I have no use for all the bells and whistles.  I want to receive and make calls only.  My only change (and it's not a game changer) would be to have a tad larger fonts on  the front screen.

Reviews.Title: Bad Phone. Please read this first...
Reviews.Author: Oleg Bogomaz "Metrotech"
Reviews.Content: Very bad phone to have.  Got this phone for my mom she likes basic phones for Voice Calls only... Well she hate this phone... Please read this and you will understand what I'm talking about.  >>>  [...]

Reviews.Title: Must Have Phone!
Reviews.Author: DasVon
Reviews.Content: The phone is super and so clear everywhere. The phone I previously had always looses reception around my bedroom, but with this Samsung SGH-C414, I get reception everywhere in my house. Furthermore, this phone is GSM UNLOCKED that can be used in most part of world. I am planning to buy more for friends overseas!

Reviews.Title: it's fine
Reviews.Author: ST
Reviews.Content: Most of the user interface is decent, but it's really hard to text with this phone. Symbols (period, comma, etc.) seem to be buried a few layers deep in the menu.

Reviews.Title: Good one
Reviews.Author: Tony Jose Francis
Reviews.Content: This is a good flip phone. I love samsung' s flips. It has nice design, light weight and sleek model. I bought this as a gift for my uncle and I'm pretty sure that he's gonna love it.

Reviews.Title: The worst crap I ever bought, never again.
Reviews.Author: Kenneth H. Stomski Sr.
Reviews.Content: The ad said one thing, the phone I got had no ringtones, wallpaper, silent mode, it was a cheap Canandian pay phone, and came without a manual to set phone. Tried my "sim card', mailbox would not work. Returned phone, once problem was understood. HATE looking at phones on Amazon, because you can not find what the phone offers for extras. Trying to find a new phone elsewhere. Problem started when T-Mobile upgraded its site for the new SMARTPHONES, my computer will no longer get their site. Amazon, only gives you the briefest of info, tooooo hard to make a good choice, and nowhere to ask about the extras. Bought a "tracphone", it sucks, will not work in house. Cheap for a reason. A simple task, made almost impossible.

ProductInfo.Features:
2G Network: GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900, 3G Network: HSPA 850 / 1900
Bluetooth 2.1 makes it easy to connect to devices like headsets for hands-free calling
Capture your world in pictures or video with the 2MP camera, English/French Languages supported
Listening to your music while you're on the go is a breeze with the integrated audio player, MicroSD Slot for Expandable memory
BULK ITEM, NO RETAIL BOX, MAY BE CARRIER BRANDED BUT IS COMPLETELY UNLOCKED, INCLUDES: Phone, Travel Charger, Rechargeable Battery, Earpiece
ProductInfo.Name: UNLOCKED Samsung SGH-C414 C414M Quad Band Flip Cell Phone, 2MP Camera, Bluetooth, MicroSD Slot, NEW, BULK PACKAGED, 2G GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHZ, 3G HSPA 850/1900MHZ
